HomePage.title: Epi’AI — Scientific Excellence at Epitech
HomePage.subtitle: Mathematics · Artificial Intelligence · Data Science
HomePage.description: A student association dedicated to strengthening the fundamental skills necessary to master artificial intelligence and data science.
HomePage.tagline: Training rigorous minds to build the technologies of tomorrow.

About.title: Our Mission & Vision
About.intro: Epi’AI is dedicated to mathematical sciences, AI, and data, aimed at strengthening pedagogical coherence within Epitech.
About.motivation_text: Many students need to deepen their math skills, the foundation of AI and Data Science. We bridge this gap to master modern technologies.
About.approach_text: Free, collaborative, and motivating learning. We gather invested and passionate profiles to ensure a serious environment of excellence.
About.impact_text: Enhancing student initiatives, strengthening the school's scientific image, and preparing students for selective Master's programs in AI.

Team.title: Our Team
Team.pole_training_mission: Organize workshops and ensure members' skill development.
Team.pole_tech_mission: Supervise technical projects and the development of association tools.
Team.pole_research_mission: Conduct technology watch and write scientific papers.
Team.pole_international_mission: Establish partnerships with foreign campuses and promote exchanges.
Team.pole_events_mission: Organize hackathons, conferences, and meetings with experts.
Team.pole_com_mission: Manage branding, design, and social media.
Team.pole_admin_mission: Ensure logistical, financial, and administrative management.

Members.mentor_1: Mr GILCHRIS HOUEKPO Dannon (PhD Candidate in AI)
Members.mentor_3: Mr Yann Néris BIOKOU (Chef Projet AI & Data)

Blog_Posts.post_0_desc: A beginner's guide to how neural networks learn and make predictions.
Blog_Posts.post_1_desc: Trends to watch in 2025: From AutoML to Edge AI.
Blog_Posts.post_2_desc: Why Python remains the king of Artificial Intelligence languages.
Blog_Posts.post_3_desc: Exploring the biases in machine learning models and how to fix them.
Blog_Posts.post_4_desc: What's the difference? A clear explanation.
Blog_Posts.post_5_desc: A recap of our 48-hour coding marathon building AI solutions.

Projects_List.proj_0_desc: A computer vision model achieving 98% accuracy on the GTSRB dataset.
Projects_List.proj_1_desc: An NLP-based assistant to help students find classrooms and schedules.
Projects_List.proj_2_desc: Analyzing student feedback using Twitter data and NLTK.
Projects_List.proj_3_desc: Using regression techniques to estimate housing prices in Paris.
Projects_List.proj_4_desc: Automating classroom attendance with OpenCV and dlib.
Projects_List.proj_5_desc: Classifying audio tracks into genres using Spectrograms and CNNs.

Join.title: Joining Epi'AI Association
Join.intro_text: Joining Epi'AI goes beyond a simple student club membership. We look for profiles driven by a requirement for rigor and a will to actively contribute to Epitech's scientific ecosystem. Motivation and commitment take precedence over initial technical skill level.
Join.conditions_list: Be an active student within the Epitech group;Demonstrate a real interest in sciences (Maths, AI, Data);Commit to respecting the association's statutes.
Join.engagement_text: Being an active member implies concrete involvement: participation in weekly pole meetings, contribution of at least one project or article per semester, and mutual aid between members.
Join.fees_text: An annual fee of 5€ is required. This symbolic amount ensures your commitment and finances technical resources (GPU, servers) as well as administrative costs.
Join.procedure_steps: Online application submission;Motivation interview with a pole lead;One-month probation period with final board validation.
Join.rights_list: Priority access to GPU computing servers;Tutoring and mentoring by our experts;Voting rights at general meetings;Access to the exclusive partner and alumni network.
Join.duties_list: Strict respect for the code of conduct and AI ethics;Sharing knowledge and teaching new members;Exemplary representation of the association during events.
Join.form_motivations_placeholder: Describe your past projects and what you wish to bring to the association...
Join.form_success: Application received. We will contact you soon.

Project_Detail.proj_0_content: Traffic sign recognition is vital for autonomous driving. The challenge was maintaining high accuracy across various weather conditions. We used a deep CNN with advanced data augmentation.
Project_Detail.proj_0_results: 98% accuracy on GTSRB dataset, inference time < 10ms.
Project_Detail.proj_1_content: Students often struggle with campus navigation. We created an intelligent chatbot using NLP to help navigate school life efficiently.
Project_Detail.proj_1_results: Over 500 daily active queries with a 92% satisfaction rate.
Project_Detail.proj_2_content: Analyzing student sentiment through social data to gain insights into campus life improvements.
Project_Detail.proj_2_results: Identified 3 major pain points for the student experience.
Project_Detail.proj_3_content: Predicting real estate prices in Paris using multivariate regression models and socio-economic data.
Project_Detail.proj_3_results: Error margin reduced to 5% compared to baseline estimates.
Project_Detail.proj_4_content: Automating classroom attendance with secure, privacy-preserving face recognition technology.
Project_Detail.proj_4_results: Saved 10 minutes per lecture, validated for production use.
Project_Detail.proj_5_content: Audio feature extraction and CNNs for high-accuracy music genre classification.
Project_Detail.proj_5_results: 94% classification accuracy on the GTZAN benchmark.

Blog_Detail.author: Author
Blog_Detail.post_0_content: Neural networks are inspired by the biological brain. This post explores activation functions, backpropagation, and optimization strategies.
Blog_Detail.post_1_content: In 2025, Data Science will focus on industrial integration and 'Edge AI' capabilities reaching new heights in local computing.
Blog_Detail.post_2_content: Why Python is the king: a look at its rich ecosystem including NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, and PyTorch for AI.
Blog_Detail.post_3_content: AI shouldn't be a black box. We discuss XAI (Explainable AI) and how to mitigate algorithmic bias in modern systems.
Blog_Detail.post_4_content: Deep Learning vs Machine Learning: understanding architecture differences and deciding which one to use for your specific needs.
Blog_Detail.post_5_content: Recap of our first hackathon: 48 hours of coffee, code, and pure innovation in artificial intelligence at Epitech.
